TEXT.TITLE: WEDGESTONE REALTY <WDG> FILES FOR OFFERING
TEXT.BODY: Wedgestone Realty Investors Trust said it has filed for an offering of 1,250,000 common shares through underwriters led by Ladenburg, Thalmann and Co and Moseley Holding Corp <MOSE>. It said the offering is expected to be made in mid-April. Reuter
